text: Emilio Pérez Touriño (; born 8 August 1948) is a Spanish politician and economist. He is the former secretary general of the Socialists' Party of Galicia. From August 2005 to March 2009, he was the president of the autonomous community of Galicia (Spain).Pérez Touriño commenting Galicianism, from newspaper A Nosa Terra . Access date 26 September 2008Pérez Touriño discussing Galicianism, from online newspaper Xornal.com.
